com.engiweb.profilemanager.common.ruleengine.action.reorganize

Class _ApplicationAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engiweb.profilemanager.common.ruleengine.action.reorganize._ApplicationAction

  • public final class _ApplicationAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to manage 'Application' entities through Drools rules engine

      • deleteProperties

        public static void deleteProperties(DAO sql,
                                    <any> blProperties,
                                    ApplicationBean applicationBean)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The method removes the properties given from the application given. If the list of properties is empty, the method skips the deletion.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        blProperties - list of properties to remove
        applicationBean - application filter, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findEntitlementByOU

        public static <any> findEntitlementByOU(DAO sql,
                                        boolean hierarchy,
                                        EntitlementBean entitlementBean,
                                        OrgUnitBean ouBean,
                                        ApplicationBean applicationBean,
                                        Paging paging)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the entitlements assigned to the organization unit and application given. The hierarchy boolean flag is used to extend the search to the children of the organization unit given. If the organization unit filter is NULL, it is used the root organization unit. It is possible to filter by entitlement.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - boolean flag to extend the search to the children of the organization unit given
        entitlementBean - entitlement filter
        ouBean - organization unit filter, mandatory
        applicationBean - application filter, mandatory. If NULL it is used the root organization unit
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of entitlements of the organization unit
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findEntitlementByPermissionType

        public static <any> findEntitlementByPermissionType(DAO sql,
                                                    EntitlementBean entitlementBean,
                                                    FunctionalityTypeBean permissionTypeBean,
                                                    ApplicationBean applicationBean,
                                                    Paging paging)
                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a BeanList of the published entitlements that have a permission with the application given and permissionType given.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        entitlementBean - entitlement filter
        permissionTypeBean - permissionType filter, mandatory
        applicationBean - application filter, mandatory
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of entitlements found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findOuHier

        public static OrgUnitCBean findOuHier(DAO sql,
                                      EntitlementBean entitlementBean,
                                      OrgUnitBean orgUnitFilterBean,
                                      OrgUnitBean orgUnitStartBean,
                                      ApplicationBean applicationBean,
                                      Paging paging)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a data structure containing the organization units that satisfy the search parameters. The return object also maintains the hierarchical structure of the organization units found.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        entitlementBean - entitlement filter
        orgUnitFilterBean - organization unit filter
        orgUnitStartBean - organization unit from which to begin the search
        applicationBean - application filter, mandatory
        paging -
        Returns:
        organization unit hierarchical object found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getApplicationManager

        public static <any> getApplicationManager(DAO sql,
                                          EntitlementBean entitlementBean,
                                          ApplicationBean applicationBean)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist of users that are managers of the application given. It is possible to filter by the entitlement, in this case it is recommended to define uniquely the entitlement filter given.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        entitlementBean - entitlement filter, if used it must be defined uniquely
        applicationBean - application filter, mandatory
        Returns:
        list of user that are managers of the application given
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
